entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sechelt 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
